field.name: Date
field.definition: the year, month and day relevant to the intellectual content of the resource

dos.practice: This field is optional field but should be completed as described below.
Enter a digitized date, when items have been digitized.
Enter a created or circa date for archived items.
Enter a published date if a resource is formally published.
Enter a submitted date if a resource has been submitted for publication.
Enter numerical values only in the following format: yyyy-mm-dd format (e.g. 1990-08-24).
The year (yyyy) is required as a minimum.
This field can be repeated as the resource achieves different status dates through its lifecycle.
If the precise date is unknown, estimate to the nearest month.

donts.practice: Do not enter dates for presentations/webcasts, posters or proceedings articles; use dateRange instead to specify the meeting event.
Do not enter dates for correspondence, interviews or embargos; use dateRange instead to specify the meeting event.
Do not enter days of the week or other non-numerical information.

documentation.domain: numerical free text in the YYYY-MM-DD format
